title: How would you rank these Big 3 girl groups (BLACKPINK, Red Velvet, and Twice) in terms of Vocals, Dancing, Stage Presence, and Visuals? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hopefully I don’t get hated on. I don’t disrespect or hate on any groups, but I do have my opinions about them, whether they may be negative or positive, and if you can’t be respectful about what I have to say, then you better scroll.  Vocals: Red Velvet: I’m pretty sure I don’t have to explain this one.Twice: Jihyo, Nayeon, and Jeongyeon are very strong vocalists, as well as decent vocalists such as Mina, Sana, and recently Tzuyu. In More and More the rapline + Tzuyu blew me away with their improvement in their verses.Blackpink isn’t bad, but Rose and Jisoo aren’t as strong as the other main and lead vocals on this list. Jennie isn’t bad, and I personally love her tone, but I can’t call her a more talented vocalist than the other vocalists.Dancing: Twice: Their choreos have only gotten better as the years have gone on and they are all in sync. There’s Momo and Mina, and then there are so many members that have the potential to be lead dancers. You have Nayeon, Sana, Tzuyu, and Jihyo, who have all be praised for their dancing improvement. When they’re performing together, I can’t see any weak spots or a lot of mistakes.Red Velvet: Though their choreos aren’t particularly hard, they are very organized and fun to watch. All five members do lots of different concepts resulting in very different dances, which is very interesting! Seulgi and Irene demonstrated incredibly difficult choreo in their sub-unit, probably the hardest choreo of all the groups on this list, but they are main and lead dancer. As a group there aren’t any glaring problems.Blackpink, again aren’t bad, but they all dance at different intensities sometimes. If you asked this question in 2016–2017, my answer may have been different, but as of now, choreos aren’t particularity imaginative nor are they eye-catching. However, they don’t really have any bad dancers, they just don’t really stand out as a group.Stage Presence: Twice: They all seem to be into the performance at all times, and that immediately makes it more enjoyable for me as the audience to see them giving it there all and delivering great performances.Blackpink: They run hot and cold. Yes I saw Coachella. No that doesn’t define them as a group. They seem to give it their all in some, and nothing in others. But lately they seem to be getting better, but the debut spark is gone.Red Velvet: Honestly when it comes to interacting, hyping, and drawing the audience in, Red Velvet isn’t very good at those things. Wendy probably the best performer, but Seulgi and Joy aren’t that bad, nor are Irene and Yeri.Visuals: I’m going to do it individually based on my preferences because I know the basics of Korean standards, but I don’t wanna make any mistakes. Irene - I’m a sucker for the original visual. 2. Jisoo - My bias keeps bias wrecking me. But i’m okay with it ;)  3. Jeongyeon - Imo she’s probably the most suited to be a model on this list.  4. Jennie - One minute i’m calling her cute, the next i’m telling her to step on me.  5. Wendy: Short hair Wendy is IT.  6. Dahyun - Whoever took this picture is so lucky.  7. Tzuyu - AJkdljfalskhuhiornfvdivfjnhskjfvlka - shit  8. Seulgi - Life’s unfair sometimes.  9. Jihyo - God Jihyo is honestly another level.  10. Sana - Her visuals added like 20 years to my life.  11. Rose(where the frick is the accent mark) - Stop it (don’t stop actually)  12. Joy - We all know this one  13. Momo: Her look keeps getting better and better.  14. Chaeyoung: Long black hair is superior.  15 Mina - Her visuals are super elegant.  16. Nayeon: I don’t know, she’s just not my favorite visual. But she super pretty <3  17. Yeri - I feel so bad because she’s my bias-wrecker, but I bias her for other things.  18. Lisa - Oml I so admire and respect her, but her visuals aren’t for me :(  I know this might not be what everyone’s thinking, but please stay respectful. Tell me if you wanna see rap, i’m running out of time rn. Sorry for any grammar/spelling errors. :)

I’m so bored and this was requested. Vocals Red Velvet - Easy answer. Wendy is an amazing vocalist and is the best singer out of these 3 girl groups. Seulgi is also really good along with Joy. Even Irene and Yeri can sing.Twice - Jeongyeon has such a beautiful voice. Jihyo does too. I think they’re stable most of the time. I feel like Momo would make a better rapper personally.Blackpink - They’re stable half of the time. Rosé is a pretty good vocalist but she can use some improvement. Jisoo has had a lot of improvement over the years. Jennie tends to yell more than sing sometimes. They have good voices though.Dancing Twice - JYPE is known for having good dancers. Momo and Mina are amazing dancers. None of the members are bad at dancing and I generally enjoy watching them dance.Blackpink - Lisa is a very talented dancer and has good isolation. I think Rose and Jennie are average dancers and Jisoo is a bit below average. Jisoo has improved the most though and I think she’ll continue to do so.Red Velvet - If this was based on main dancers alone, Red Velvet would be 1. Seulgi is so underhyped when she’s one of the best female dancers. Overall though, Red Velvet could use a bit of work in the dancing area but they aren’t that bad.Stage Presence Twice - They have really good stage presence. I enjoy watching their performances a lot. Momo and Jihyo’s stage presence is amazing. They’re pretty strong in this area.Blackpink - Lisa has the best stage presence and she’s very entertaining to watch. Jennie’s stage presence is only strong every once in a while, but it’s normally kind of dull. Rosé has okay stage presence but sometimes she pops off. Jisoo has regular stage presence I’d say.Red Velvet - This is kind of a sore spot for them. Seulgi has really good stage presence but the other members can be a bit boring at times. They all have their moments though.Visuals Red Velvet - Yeri is the cutest person ever and the rest of them are so beautiful. Their visuals are my personal favorite.Twice - I really like their visuals. They’re all so beautiful like wtf. They also have very unique visuals too.Blackpink - I really like Rosé’s visuals. She literally glows. They have unique visuals too but I just prefer Twice and RV’s visuals. They’re all super pretty though.Yeah that’s all. If there was another section for Rap then Blackpink would definitely take that spot. These are my own opinions though. ~Liz
